Package org.pioto.radiothermostat.api

This package contains interfaces for a public API for the Radio Thermostat.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SystemInfo
    Represents some basic information about the thermostat system.
    Thermostat
    The main interface for interacting with the thermostat.
    ThermostatTime
    Interface representing the time, as tracked by the thermostat.
    ThermostatTimeFactory
    Factory for creating new ThermostatTime instances.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DayOfWeek
    The day of the week represented by a ThermostatTime.
    FanMode
    An enum representing the different possible fan modes for the thermostat.
    OperatingMode
    Type representing the operating mode of the thermostat.
    ThermostatState
    Represents the current operating state of the thermostat.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ThermostatException  

Package org.pioto.radiothermostat.api Description

This package contains interfaces for a public API for the Radio Thermostat.

The main interface for interacting with the thermostat is the Thermostat interface. Implementations should register as an OSGi service.

Author:
Mike Kelly (pioto@pioto.org)
